Start: ^I skipped breakfast today because I wasn't feeling it, but now, I feel like getting some grub.
^I fill up my plate up, and go to sit down.
SadStart: ^I spot Timothy sitting at one of the tables by his lonesome.
^I sit myself down with my meal.
^he seems to be in a quiet mood today.<delay=2>@ whatever.
^I silently eat with him Timothy for a while, until I hear a loud voice approach.

g-0: ^[Max] "Again? You two really need to get your sleep schedules"
^Max seems to have also walked in, overhearing Eduardo's hard to miss voice.
^[Charlotte] "Really now. If either of you need assistance making a schedule, you can just ask"
^In an instant, the table I was sitting at was surrounded by the people I know, laughing.
^It's... odd.<delay=2>@ almost like we're a big happy family.

Breakdown: ^Timothy stays quiet, But Eduardo doesn't seem to notice.

g-0: ^In fact, looking at Timothy, I notice a handful of things off.
^He doesn't seem to be looking at anything in particular, and he's shaking slightly.
^Timothy looks vaguely in my direction, and reaches his hand out.
^His hand clasps onto my arm with a shaky, but intense grip. I feel his heartbeat, racing insanely fast.
^His lips move, as if trying to speak, but no words come from them.
^With his free hand, he clutches onto his shirt.
^all these little tiny actions I pick up, draw my mind to a conclusion that something is happening to Timothy.
g-1: ^no one seems to hear my weak call, over the chatter and laughter.

b: ^my voice fails to break over the chatter. @(Your Expression is too low)
^I need to speak up more, but...
^I can't get their attention this way.
^I'm going to need to move over there, and grab them.
^in an instant, Max drops their carefree attitude, seeing Timothy in distress.
^] "I think he's having a panic attack."
^[Max] "Hey, Timothy. I "m here. whatever's happening, I'm hear to help."
^"there's nothing to be afraid of. your safe here."
^I feel Timothy's grip on my arm loosen, as his breath finally breaks into a stuttering inhale.
^"There there. It's okay. just breath. just breath"
^As Timothy begins to breathe again, the tears begin to flow. @He's balling up a storm.
^[Max] "hehe, Its okay. you've done nothing wrong."
^"We don't have to stay here if you don't want to."
^He nods his head, and Max quickly walks Timothy out of the Cafe to a more comfortable place.

ForcefulAssistence: ^I begin to move over to get Max, but I'm pulled back by Timothy's grip.
^His grip tightens, as his eyes begin to water. @I can't leave Timothy here.
BreakPoint: ^I... I don't know what to do. @I... I can't do anything!
^I try to get up, and get Max. @@To get away from all of this.
^I Pull my arm, to try and free it from Timothy's Vice-like grip, but to no avail.
^He doesn't seem to want to let go.
^To free myself, I pry my finger's underneath his palm, and peel his finger's off me.
^I free my hand, and jump up out of my seat, leaving Timothy where he sat.
^] "It's Timothy. He-He's acting weird, and not responding. I-I think something wrong!"
^Max darts past me to where Timothy is sitting in a speed quite frightening for someone their size.
HowDoIComfort: ^I choose to stay beside Timothy, and attempt to help him thru this.

b: ^"Um, uh... It... its Okay. Calm down Timothy. Relax. it's going to be okay. uh-uh."
^Timothy doesn't respond to my words, only giving a sharp inhale. @(Your Grace is too low)
^I... I don't know what I'm doing.
^I'm not going to be capable of helping Timothy.
^I have no idea what I'm supposed to do. If there is anything to do.
^I need to get Max. They're actually trained to handle this kind of situation.
^"Its okay Timothy. You're going to be okay."
^I put my not-griped hand on his hand, and get him to look at me.
^"Its okay. Your safe. I'm here for you."
^"It's okay, you can breathe. there there."
^and like that, the floodgates open. He exhales a sputter of air, as tears fall across his face.
^] "It's okay. let it out. Your safe here. it’s okay."
^as if by magic, Max appears beside me. I guess they noticed what had been happening over hear.
^[Max] "Do you want to go someplace quiet?"
^Timothy nods thru the tears and shivering.
^Max takes his hands, and begins to take Timothy away. We share a glance, as I feel like their thanking me.
^And like that, Max and Timothy left the cafe.

MoodKiller: ^My attention draws back to crowd of people around me.
^[Charlotte] "It was a rather humorous endeavor. hm?"
^[Eduardo] "Daaaaaaaaaang man. Timothy just lost his sh-"
^Isaac jabs his boyfriend in the gut.
^Isaac drags Eduardo out of the cafe in a huff.
^"Well. I'm out. See you at dinner."

g-0: ^I slump, as I get up out of my chair, and towards the door.
